text: It went by in the blink of an eye, didn't it...?

Working in different regions feels like a little vacation,
so it's fun, but it passes by quickly because of that.

I understand...!
It's exciting, isn't it...?

-From now on too,
let's go to various places and feel that excitement.
-To go meet everyone in various places, right?

To meet everyone who has been supporting us all along,
those who will become fans in the future, and everyone else.
